name: Basement Breakout
description:
In this game, you play as a female college student who goes by the name of Claire, who has gotten kidnapped by her stalker and is being held captive in his basement. You must now use all your wit and cunning to overcome a series of challenging problems in order to escape from your stalker. Should the player have a device that has gyroscope capabilities, the player will be able to make use of a unique mechanic in the game which is moving the camera based on the rotation of the device. This will help the player feel much more immersed in the game as this will make the player feel as if they themselves are being locked in the basement.

Hope you have fun and do leave feedbacks!!
